author: MiniWarGaming
description:
Matthew walks you through the creation of a mega, inter-connected table that he is creating for their upcoming Necromunda campaign.  Let us know what you think!

Check out the Depths of Perdition Kickstarter here:  https://www.miniwargaming.com/perdition

*Important Links*

title: Creating an Enormous Inter-Connected Necromunda Table

author: MiniWarGaming
description: See the amazing Necromunda scenery come together on this massive gaming table! Matthew is setting up a sprawling Necromunda table using modular terrain to create an epic wargaming experience. What do you want to see in the upcoming Necromunda campaign?
title: This Mega Table Has Secret Tunnels! #necromunda
